title: 怎么用命令方块弄放在桌子上的书
author: wuheyixia
txt_content:
求各位大侠指点...要1.11.2的
做解密地图用啊

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:"book",Count:1b}],Pose:{Head:[90.0f,0.0f,0.0f]},DisabledSlots:2096896,Invisible:1b,NoGravity:1b,Tags:["book"]}

输入tp @e[tag=book] ~x ~x ~x(修改x的数值)可以移动这个书来调整到一个恰当的位置

replies.author: Monjack
replies.txt_content:
Anyone can not help
路过。。

replies.author: wuheyixia
replies.txt_content:
Monjack 发表于 2017-9-17 14:33

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
有用盔甲架手上的
...有放盆栽的(改材质)
...有开箱子的(改材质)
...

/summon armor_stand ~ ~-0.3 ~ {Invisible:1b,Invulnerable:1b,PersistenceRequired:1b,NoGravity:1b,ShowArms:1b,ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{}],HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:clock",Count:1b},{}],DisabledSlots:2039582,Pose:{Body:[179f,0f,0f],Head:[180f,0f,0f],LeftLeg:[180f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[180f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[270f,0f,0f],RightArm:[0f,0f,0f]}}复制代码

replies.txt_content:
